txt.en: An allied catapult has been damaged
A powder keg has weakened the tower base ([placeholder]/10)
The tower winch has been destroyed

Saruman's forces have sent out their siege weapons to wreak havoc upon the battlefront. While the men on the wall focus on surviving the boulders raining down upon them, foes have crept into the deep and are planning on using black powder to destroy one of the siege-towers from below.
Defeat the waves of attackers at the tower base ([placeholder]/10)
Do not allow 10 powder kegs to be detonated at the tower base ([placeholder]/10)

Aragorn has moved to guard the siege-tower's base from sappers in the deep, while the men upon the wall have braced themselves for a hail of fire from the enemy's catapults.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Powder keg is detonated at tower base
